---
title: 'Geographic changes in the Aegean Sea since the Last Glacial Maximum: Postulating
  biogeographic effects of sea-level rise on islands'
type: pub
encoding: UTF-8

---
<h1>Publication</h1>

H., Stocchi, P., Hammoud, C., Kougioumoutzis, K., Georgopoulou, E., Van Loon, E., Tjørve, K. M. C., &#38; Tjørve, E. (2017). Geographic changes in the Aegean Sea since the Last Glacial Maximum: Postulating biogeographic effects of sea-level rise on islands. <i>Palaeogeography, Palaeoclimatology, Palaeoecology</i>, <i>471</i>(2017, 4), 108–119. <a href="https://doi.org/10.1016/j.palaeo.2017.02.002">https://doi.org/10.1016/j.palaeo.2017.02.002</a></div> </div>
